name: coffeincode/contao-downloadarchive-bundle
description: Downloadarchive for 5.3 - this extension is a fork/port of laemmi/contao-downloadarchive which ported the original Downloadarchive by felixpfeiffer/contao-downloadarchive. Credit goes to felixpfeiffer, as the concept is not my work  - I only ported it to Contao 5.3 and moved it to using twig and as much symfony as possible.
